title: adc main looking for supp bronze - silver
body:
Fed up of poor match ups with people who don't even wanna play supp, cant progress when half the games are trolls and the other half your partner in crime cant be arsed to play XD 

Hit me up if you wanna give it a shot.

Regards,
A lonely adc

replies.body:
Im not a support main, but Im quite good with soraka and braum as support.
Im silver 3 atm, feel free to add me if you want

Support main too...

My advice is to get someone who plays another lane to duo as duoing will boost up the elo of the other team and in most casts, you may not carry bot but will lose mid and top. To get out quickly in bronze, the only way is to play jungle carry.

Add me in-game

Support main, also tired of shtty match-ups with people who just run and get themselves killed and blame it on support.

I like playing agro but depending on situation.

Been on a losing strike lately cuz trolls and people leaving towards end of match, and has been frustrating AF

support main
used to be able to carry half assed but people rather troll and ban my picks rather than win.
